footer.description: Wedding Photographer based in Hauts-de-Seine (92) near Paris, France

carousel-testimonials.title: Testimonials
carousel-testimonials.description1: Jeremy captured all the important moments of our day. Thank you so much for your support, advice, and patience throughout the day.
carousel-testimonials.alt1: Wedding photo at Domaine Ferme Sainte Anne by Jeremy Dan
carousel-testimonials.description2: His creative ideas and the grain of the photo editing added a magical touch. We highly recommend Jeremy's services to all future brides and grooms looking for a talented and flexible photographer!
carousel-testimonials.alt2: Wedding photo at Domaine de la Gillardière by Jeremy Dan
carousel-testimonials.description3: Friendly, available, attentive to both the couple and the guests. Everyone was delighted with the work and the flow of the day. To all future couples, I warmly recommend Jeremy for his energy, professionalism, kindness, and great spirit.
carousel-testimonials.alt3: Wedding photo in the North of Montpellier by Jeremy Dan
carousel-testimonials.description4: I can only recommend Jeremy for his discretion, punctuality, efficiency, talent, but most importantly for his human side.
carousel-testimonials.alt4: Wedding photo at Lac des Estives in Montgreleix by Jeremy Dan
carousel-testimonials.description5: We hired Jeremy for our wedding following a recommendation from one of our friends, and we were not disappointed: professional and involved on the big day, he was also appreciated by all the guests.
carousel-testimonials.alt5: Wedding photo in the North of Montpellier by Jeremy Dan
carousel-testimonials.description6: I stumbled upon his work from another wedding and it was obvious: I had found the photographer for my event. Snapshots full of spontaneity, moments of happiness and joy immortalized
carousel-testimonials.alt6: Wedding photo at Domaine des Mylords in Tarascon by Jeremy Dan

photo-tiles.title: Capture the moment
photo-tiles.description: Each moment is unique, every story deserves to be told the way it really is. My role is to capture the essence of these precious moments that form the most beautiful chapters of your life.

home-page.subtitle: Authentic Photos for Real People.
home-page.description: There is nothing more incredible than finding the person you can't live without. Your true best friend. I want to photograph that connection. Whether we go on an adventure to a beautiful place or explore the intimacy of your own home, I want to capture your true personalities. Don’t hold back. You only have this moment. Be yourself, and I’ll be myself. Let’s create something real.

about-page.alt: Photo of Jeremy Dan, wedding photographer.

about-section.description1: Introducing oneself can be a delicate exercise but so important when entrusting a photographer. So, here's my little story!
about-section.description2: My name is Jeremy, I am 28 years old, and I have the privilege of sharing my life with the person who gives it meaning. I have three passions: photography, music, and skateboarding. In life, I save your most beautiful moments and create websites. The website you are currently browsing was designed by me. French is my native language, and I am fluent in English. I am also learning Swedish and hope to live there for a few years someday. I love stepping out of my comfort zone, sharing, and learning what the world has to offer.
about-section.description3: Photography is the most tangible way for me to connect with the things that matter most to me: the relationships and bonds we build throughout our lives. I believe we don't pay enough attention to what happens around us, letting fleeting moments slip by. This is why I do what I do.
about-section.description4: My goal is to capture these significant moments with the sincerity they deserve. I want these images to be beautiful and genuine, no matter the occasion. Ultimately, that's what matters most to me.

portfolio-page.subtitle: Portfolio
portfolio-page.description: A selection of some of my favorite photos from the weddings I've covered.

blog-page.title: Journal
blog-page.description: Some love stories close to my heart that I want to share with you.

wedding-domaine-gillardiere.title: Wedding at Domaine de la Gillardière
wedding-domaine-gillardiere.excerpt: A beautiful wedding in the heart of Brie-Comte-Robert at Domaine de la Gillardière.
wedding-domaine-gillardiere.content: A hundred guests were present to celebrate Roxane and Tanguy's wedding. Emotional speeches, minimalist decoration, and an evening introduced by a majestic dance. Congratulations to you both!

contact-page.hero-title: Let's Get to Know Each Other

cf.title: Contact Form
cf.project_type-desc: Select the type of project you're looking for.

wedding.title: Wedding
wedding.desc: I look forward to discussing your project and the opportunities we can explore together. To capture your story through my photos (or videos), it's important for me to learn more about you and your dream event. If we’re on the same wavelength, I'll suggest a meeting over coffee or via Google Meet for busy schedules! My pricing is shared during appointments and starts at 1200 euros for weddings.
wedding.event_location-placeholder: The location(s) where your wedding will take place
wedding.message-placeholder: From the colors of your theme to the special moments you want to immortalize, I want to know it all! Share your ideas, dreams, and even the little details that will make your event unique. The more I know, the better I can capture the event that truly represents you.
wedding.knowing_source-label: How did you hear about me?
wedding.knowing_source-desc: This helps me a lot in developing my business!
